thread.title: Chris Hemsworth's kids watching him on TV at the Golden Globes is too adorable
thread.title_full: Chris Hemsworth's kids watching him on TV at the Golden Globes is too adorable

author: Johnny Lieu
title: Chris Hemsworth's kids watching him on TV at the Golden Globes is too adorable
text:
Loathe the thought of having children? Well, maybe this photo will change your mind. Maybe.
It's of Chris Hemsworth's kids watching him on TV during the Golden Globes on Sunday, and by gosh, it's pretty adorable.
SEE ALSO: Denzel Washington is all of us watching the Golden Globes
"My little fan club cheering me on," Hemsworth wrote in an Instagram post on Monday evening.
My little fan club cheering me on ðŸŽ¥ @cristianprieto.filmmaker @elsapatakyconfidential
A photo posted by Chris Hemsworth (@chrishemsworth) on Jan 9, 2017 at 5:20pm PST
One of the three children appears to be trying to reach for their actor dad, who was on stage presenting alongside actress Gal Gadot.
What's more, a miniature Thor doll is parked alongside the trio, completing this rather wholesome sight.
The original picture was posted on the Instagram of Cristian Prieto , the older half-brother of Hemsworth's equally adorable wife, Elsa Pataky.
Earlier, Pataky posted a selfie of herself and her husband, telling followers that they were running late to the event.
A photo posted by Elsa Pataky (@elsapatakyconfidential) on Jan 8, 2017 at 3:27pm PST
Meanwhile, Hemsworth was telling Instagram to check out his "hot date" a.k.a. Pataky.
Priorities, hey.
A photo posted by Chris Hemsworth (@chrishemsworth) on Jan 8, 2017 at 3:20pm PST
BONUS: Meryl Streep lifetime achievement award
